title: Trojanized ESET Installers Drop Kalambur Backdoor in Phishing Attacks on Ukraine
description: A previously unknown threat activity cluster has been observed impersonating Slovak cybersecurity company ESET as part of phishing attacks targeting Ukrainian entities. The campaign, detected in May 2025, is tracked by the security outfit under the moniker InedibleOchotense, describing it as Russia-aligned. "InedibleOchotense sent spear-phishing emails and Signal text messages, containing a link
